title: Retrieve your blacklisted members
description: Retrieves a list of all the members on the authenticated user's blacklist.
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

returns.description: Collection of <MemberId> A list of blacklisted members.

fields.name: MemberId
fields.description: The ID of the member. This may be 0, if we determine it is necessary to protect the member's privacy.

fields.name: Nickname
fields.description: The nickname of the member. Some characters may be changed, if we determine it is necessary to protect the member's privacy.

fields.name: DateAddressVerified
fields.description: The date the member was address verified.

fields.name: UniqueNegative
fields.description: The number of distinct members who have placed negative feedback against this member.

fields.name: UniquePositive
fields.description: The number of distinct members who have placed positive feedback against this member.

fields.name: FeedbackCount
fields.description: The member's total feedback (UniquePositive minus UniqueNegative).

fields.name: IsAddressVerified
fields.description: Indicates whether the member has been address verified.

fields.name: IsDealer
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is a car dealer.

fields.name: IsAuthenticated
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is authenticated.

fields.name: IsInTrade
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is a professional trader.

fields.name: IsRentiUser
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is a renti user.
